sense.def:
Kar je
regular
, se dogaja v rednih časovnih razmikih.

seg.quote: They give regular Sunday afternoon concerts.
You need to take regular exercise.
The doctor examined the baby at regular intervals.
The members meet regularly in one another's homes.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
regular
opisujemo tudi dogodke, ki se pogosto ponavljajo.

Z izrazom
regular
opisujemo tudi ljudi, ki pogosto obiščejo določen kraj.

seg.quote: He's one of the regulars at the village pub.

sense.def:
One's regular way of doing something
je način, kako praviloma nekaj opravljamo.

seg.quote: You can get in touch with a psychiatrist through your regular doctor.

sense.def:
Kar je
regular
, je sestavljeno iz delov enake velikosti ali je videti simetrično in uravnoteženo.

seg.quote: His face was sun-tanned, with regular features.

sense.def:
Glagol, samostalnik ali pridevnik, ki je
regular
, ima taka obrazila kot večina drugih glagolov, samostalnikov ali pridevnikov v jeziku.
